name: perl-readonly

variants.name: build_system
variants.description: Build systems supported by the package

description: Readonly - Facility for creating read-only scalars, arrays, hashes

dependencies.name: perl
dependencies.description:
Perl 5 is a highly capable, feature-rich programming language with over
27 years of development.

dependencies.name: perl-module-build-tiny
dependencies.description: Module::Build::Tiny - A tiny replacement for Module::Build

dependent_to.name: perl-data-predicate
dependent_to.description:
Predicate objects for Perl. A predicate object is an object that
encapsulates conditions.

dependent_to.name: perl-ipc-run
dependent_to.description:
IPC::Run allows you to run and interact with child processes using
files, pipes, and pseudo-ttys. Both system()-style and scripted usages
are supported and may be mixed. Likewise, functional and OO API styles
are both supported and may be mixed.

dependent_to.name: circos
dependent_to.description: Circos is a software package for visualizing data and information.

dependent_to.name: perl-readonly-xs
dependent_to.description:
Companion module for Readonly.pm, to speed up read-only scalar
variables.

dependent_to.name: perl-ppix-quotelike
dependent_to.description: Parse Perl string literals and string-literal-like things.

dependent_to.name: perl-perl-critic
dependent_to.description: Critique Perl source code for best-practices.

dependent_to.name: perl-perl-critic-moose
dependent_to.description: Policies for Perl::Critic concerned with using Moose
